definition: don't let rhetoric spoil the message (idiom); don't get carried away with flowery speech to the detriment of what you want to say
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
